deploy_animation_clip.description: [anim_clip]Animation clip when deploying this stratagem ball.

stratagem_red_effect.description: Effect to play for red colored stratagems.

stratagem_blue_effect.description: Effect to play for blue colored stratagems.

stratagem_yellow_effect.description: Effect to play for yellow colored stratagems.

idle_jump_strength.description: What force should we use when we are trying to unjam the stratagem ball after it has been idling? Setting to 0 disables this feature.

bias_jump_strength.description: What force should we use when we are trying to bias the stratagem ball's direction when it hits an invalid surface? Setting to 0 disables this feature.

strat_audio_cooldown_time.description: How long should we wait, before we switch the stratagem_cooldown switch to off_cooldown after throwing an offensive stratagem ball

strat_audio_cooldown_distance.description: If the ball is thrown inside this distance, the stratagem_cooldown switch will be set to off_cooldown
